text: فاخذتهم الرجفة فاصبحوا۟ فى دارهم جثمين

translations.translation: So the earthquake seized them and morning found them lying flattened in their homes.
Then they were seized by an earthquake, and lay overturned on the ground in their homes in the morning.
Thereupon a shocking catastrophe seized them, and they remained prostrate in their dwellings.
Suddenly, an earthquake struck them and left them motionless in their homes.
Therefore the earthquake seized them – so at morning they remained lying flattened in their homes.
So the earthquake seized them and they lay (dead), prostrate in their homes.
Then the earthquake overtook them, so they became motionless bodies in their abode.
So the earthquake seized them, and morning found them in their habitation fallen prostrate,
So the earthquake seized them and morning found them prostrate in their dwelling-place.
Thereupon an earthquake overtook them and morning found them lying flattened in their homes;
Whereupon an earthquake laid hold of them: so that they lay prone in their dwelling.
So the earthquake seized them, and they lay lifeless prostrate in their homes.
But the earthquake took them unawares, and they lay prostrate in their homes before the morning!
So the earthquake seized them and they lay (dead), prostrate in their homes.
So the earthquake seized them, at the morning they were crouched in their dwellings, dead.
Thereupon, the quake struck them; and they became lifeless bodies in their homes.
So the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone.
[7:91] So the Trembling, the violent earthquake, seized them, and they lay lifeless prostrate in their habitations, keeled over their knees, dead.
(So the earthquake) and the loud noise announcing their torment (seized them, and morning found them prostrate) dead (in their dwelling-place) in their town and encampments.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلرَّجْفَةُ } معناهُ الحَرَكةُ مِنَ الأَرضِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلرَّجْفَةُ } والزلزلة الشديدة فخر عليهم سقوف بيوتهمه { فَأَصْبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمْ } التي يستقرون فيها { جَاثِمِينَ } [الأعراف: 91] جامدين ميتين

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فأخذتهم الرجفةُ } أي: الزلزلة
 وفي سورة الحجر
 { الصيحة } ، ولعلها كانت من مبادئها، { فأصبحوا في دارهم } أي: في مدينتهم { جاثمين } باركين ميتين
